example.parse: (IP (LST (CD 4)) (PU ．) (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (MSP 所) (VP (VV 制造) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-1))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 问题))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 应) (VP (VV 多过) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VV 解决) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 问题)))))))
example.arg: *OP* *pro* 所 制造 *T*-1 的 问题
